mapper.select: select e.id as userId, b.level as actingLevel, ifnull(c.commissionAmount, 0) as commissionAmount, ifnull(d.sumTotal, 0) as rechargeAmount, e.create_date as createDate, ifnull(f.consumptionAmount, 0) as amount from acting_hierarchy_relation a left join acting b on a.acting_id = b.id left join(select (sum(amount)) as commissionAmount, create_by from sys_user_account where type = '0' and spending = '0' and del_flag = '0' group by create_by) c on c.create_by = a.create_by left join (select (sum(amount)) as sumTotal, create_by from recharge_detail where pay_status = '1' and del_flag = '0' group by create_by) d on a.create_by = d.create_by left join sys_user e on a.create_by = e.id left join(select (sum(amount)) as consumptionAmount, create_by from sys_user_account where type = '2' and spending = '1' and del_flag = '0' group by create_by) f on f.create_by = a.create_by where a.superior_id = #{id} order by e.create_date desc

select a.create_by as createBy, ifnull(sum(a.amount), 0) as incomeAmount, ifnull(b.expenditureAmount, 0) as expenditureAmount from sys_user_account a left join (select create_by, sum(amount) as expenditureAmount from sys_user_account where spending = '1' group by create_by) b on a.create_by = b.create_by where a.spending = '0' and a.create_by = #{userId} and a.del_flag = '0'

select a.create_by as createBy, ifnull(count(0), 0) as grabCount, ifnull(b.unpackCount, 0) as unpackCount from sys_user_account a left join (select create_by, count(0) as unpackCount from sys_user_account where type = '1' group by create_by) b on a.create_by = b.create_by where a.type = '2' and a.del_flag = '0' and a.create_by = #{userId}

select ifnull(a.commissionBalanceAmount, 0) as commissionBalanceAmount, ifnull(b.redEnvelopeAmount, 0) as redEnvelopeAmount, ifnull(c.grabAmount, 0) as grabAmount, ifnull(d.withdrawalAmount, 0) as withdrawalAmount, ifnull(e.rechargeAmount, 0) as rechargeAmount from (select sum(amount) as commissionBalanceAmount from sys_user_account where create_by = #{userId} and type = '0' and spending = '0' and del_flag = '0' ) a, (select sum(amount) as redEnvelopeAmount from sys_user_account where create_by = #{userId} and type = '1' and spending = '0' and del_flag = '0' ) b, (select sum(amount) as grabAmount from sys_user_account where create_by = #{userId} and type = '2' and spending = '1' and del_flag = '0' ) c, (select sum(amount) as withdrawalAmount from sys_user_account where create_by = #{userId} and type = '3' and spending = '1' and del_flag = '0' ) d, (select sum(amount) as rechargeAmount from recharge_detail where create_by = #{userId} and pay_type = '2' and del_flag = '0') e
